DataElement.preferredName: Patient Infusion Catheter Maintenance Occurrence Yes No Unknown Not Applicable Indicator
DataElement.preferredDefinition: The yes/no/unknown/not applicable indicator relating to the upkeep/maintenance of an infusion catheter, an invasive flexible tube placed within a tumor location to deliver fluids or therapy.

DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: Date of upkeep/maintenance of an infusion catheter, an invasive flexible tube placed within a tumor location to deliver fluids or therapy. [Manually-curated]

ObjectClass.preferredDefinition: A person who receives medical attention, care, or treatment, or who is registered with medical professional or institution with the purpose to receive medical care when necessary.:A method of putting fluids, including drugs, into the bloodstream. Also called intravenous infusion.:(KATH-i-ter) A flexible tube used to deliver fluids into or withdraw fluids from the body.:The act of sustaining something in its current form or proper condition; upkeep.

Concepts.definition: A person who receives medical attention, care, or treatment, or who is registered with medical professional or institution with the purpose to receive medical care when necessary.
Any form of treatment that is introduced into the body via a blood vessel, a muscle, or the spinal cord.
(KATH-i-ter) A flexible tube used to deliver fluids into or withdraw fluids from the body.
The act of sustaining something in its current form or proper condition; upkeep.

Property.preferredDefinition: Occurrence; an instance of something happening.

Concepts.definition: An instance of something happening, such as an event or incident.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: Tests, examinations, evaluations used to determine a subject's status or response to intervention.
ConceptualDomain.changeDescription: Created initially to support CCR value domain for CTMS.

ValueDomain.preferredName: Yes No Unknown Not Applicable Indicator
ValueDomain.preferredDefinition: The preferred Value Domain to indicate a question with permissible values of yes/no/unknown/not applicable.

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: The non-affirmative response to a question.

Concepts.definition: The non-affirmative response to a question.

ValueMeaning.administrativeNotes: 2022.12.28 Alt VM added per ticket request CADSR0001837. aj

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: Not known, not observed, not recorded, or refused.

Concepts.definition: Not known, observed, recorded; or reported as unknown by the data contributor.

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: The affirmative response to a question.

Concepts.definition: The affirmative response to a question.

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: Determination of a value is not relevant in the current context.

Concepts.definition: Determination of a value is not relevant in the current context.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: Conceptual domain that includes value meanings to be used for Indicator Value Meanings such as Yes, No, Unknown, No Applicable

RepresentationTerm.preferredDefinition: A response or indicator that can have a value of yes, no, unknown, or not applicable.

Concepts.longName: Yes, No, Unknown, or Not Applicable Response
Concepts.definition: A response or indicator that can have a value of yes, no, unknown, or not applicable.
